settings.html:
<style>
 .elementor-element-0fd7e36 {
     padding: 0;
 }
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
   
        }

        body {
            font-family: "Fjalla One", Sans-serif;
            color: black;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }


.sibling h1 {
  font-family: "Anton", sans-serif !important;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 35rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

 

        .container {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100vh;
            margin: 0 auto;
            /* background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }

        .parent-container {
            display: flex;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        p {
  font-family: "DM Sans", sans-serif !important;
}

        @media (max-width: 991px) {

            /* styles go here */
            .parent-container {
                display: flex;
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                position: relative;
            }
        }

        .section {
            width: 25%;
            height: 100%;
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: black;
            font-weight: bold;
            /*gap: 1.rem;*/
            background-color: white;
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {

            /* styles go here */
            .section {
                display: flex;
                width: 100%;
                flex-direction: row;
                 gap:.3rem !important;
            }


        }
        .section .section-header {
            font-size: 1.8rem !important;
            font-family: "Fjalla One", Sans-serif;
            text-align: center !important;
        }
        .section .section-wrapper {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;

            align-items: center;
        }

        .section .primary-img {
            height: 0;

        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .section {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: flex-start;
                gap: 0;
                justify-items: center;
            }
             .section .section-header {
                 margin: 0 !important;
            font-size: 1.2rem !important;
            text-align: center !important;
        }

            .section .primary-img {
                height: 10rem;

            }

            .section {
                display: grid;
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
                /* 2 columns */
                grid-template-rows: auto auto;
                /* 2 rows */
                /* gap: 1rem; */
                align-items: center;
            }

            /* Top-left */
            .number {
            font-family: "Fjalla One", Sans-serif;
                grid-column: 1;
                grid-row: 1;
                margin-bottom: .5rem;
                align-self: flex-end;
            }

            /* Bottom-left */
            .section-inner {
                grid-column: 1;
                grid-row: 2;
                align-self: flex-start;
            }

            /* Right side spanning both rows */
            .primary-img {
                grid-column: 2;
                grid-row: 1 / span 2;

            }

        }

        .section .number {
            font-size: 4rem !important;
            

        }

        .section:nth-of-type(1) .number {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #31D677 30%, #259B57 72%);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}


      .section:nth-of-type(2) .number {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #A259FF 0%, #6A0DAD 72%);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}


        .section:nth-of-type(3) .number {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #FF4F78 40%, #D92A54 72%);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}


       .section:nth-of-type(4) .number {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #FFA94D 40%, #FF7E3D 72%);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}




        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .section .number {
                font-size: 2rem !important;
            }
        }

        .section .flavour {
            font-weight: 400;
            color: rgb(121, 121, 121);
            text-align: left;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: flex-start;
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .section .view-more {
            padding: .5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 2rem;
            border: 1px solid grey;
            background-color: transparent;
            outline: none;
            margin-top: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .section-inner {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: .5rem;
            flex-direction: column;
        }




        .siblings-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            position: absolute;
            inset: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            z-index: -1;
            /* pointer-events: none; */
            display: flex;
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {

            /* styles go here */
            .siblings-container {
                display: flex;
                flex-direction: column;

            }
        }

        .sibling {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: flex-start;
            color: white;
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .sibling {
                height: 100%;
                width: 100%;
            }
        }

        .sibling div {
            width: 35%;
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {

            /* styles go here */
            .sibling div {
                width: 100%;
            }
        }

        .sibling h1 {
            font-size: 150px !important;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {

            /* styles go here */
            .sibling h1 {
                font-size: 90px !important;
            }
        }

        .sibling:nth-of-type(1) h1 {
            transform: translateX(-50%);
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .sibling:nth-of-type(1) h1 {
                transform: translateX(0);
            }

        }

        .sibling:nth-child(1) {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #31D677 30%, #259B57 72%);
  clip-path: polygon(0 0, 25% 0, 25% 100%, 0 100%);
  left: 0;
}


        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .sibling:nth-child(1) {
                clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 25%, 0 25%);
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                justify-content: center;


            }

            /* styles go here */
        }

        .sibling:nth-child(2) {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #A259FF 0%, #6A0DAD 72%);
  clip-path: polygon(0 0, 25% 0, 25% 100%, 0 100%);
  left: 25%;
  justify-content: center;
}


        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .sibling:nth-child(2) {
                clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 25%, 0 25%);
                top: 25%;
                left: 0;
            }

            /* styles go here */
        }

        .sibling:nth-child(3) {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #FF4F78 40%, #D92A54 72%);
  clip-path: polygon(0 0, 25% 0, 25% 100%, 0 100%);
  left: 50%;
  justify-content: center;
}


        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .sibling:nth-child(3) {
                clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 25%, 0 25%);
                top: 50%;
                left: 0;
            }

            /* styles go here */
        }

       .sibling:nth-child(4) {
  background: radial-gradient(at center center, #FFA94D 40%, #FF7E3D 72%);
  clip-path: polygon(0 0, 25% 0, 25% 100%, 0 100%);
  left: 25%;
  justify-content: center;
}


        @media (max-width: 991px) {
            .sibling:nth-child(4) {
                clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 25%, 0 25%);
                top: 75%;
                left: 0;
            }

            /* styles go here */
        }

        .sibling .info {
            position: absolute;
            left: 10%;
            top: 70%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            gap: 1rem;
            opacity: 0;
            color: white;
        }
        .sibling .info h2 {
            font-size: 2rem !important;
            color: white;
        }
        

        .info button {

            padding: .5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 16px;
            outline: none;
            border: 1px solid #fff;
            color: white;
          


        }

        .size {
            position: absolute;
            left: 90%;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: .75rem;
            opacity: 0;
        }

        .size .option {
            font-size: .8rem;
            width: 4rem;
            aspect-ratio: 1/1;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.185);
            color: white;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            align-content: center;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .size .option:first-child {
            background: white;
            color: black;
            /* example */
        }

        @media (max-width: 991px) {

            /* styles go here */
            .view-more {
                display: none;
            }

            .sibling .info {
                display: none;

            }

            .info {
                display: none;
            }

            .size {
                display: none;
            }
        }
    </style>

    <style>
        .section .section-inner,
        .section .view-more {
            color: black;
            transition: color 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .section .flavour {
            color: gray;
            transition: color 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .section .view-more {
            border: 1px solid gray;
            /* or whatever default */
        }

        /* Hover effect */

        @media (min-width: 991px) {

            .section:hover .section-inner,
            .section:hover .view-more {
                color: white;
                border-color: white;
            }

            .section:hover .flavour {
                color: white;
            }
        }

        @keyframes elasticY {
            0% {
                transform: translateY(-60px);
            }

            /* initial lift smaller */
            35% {
                transform: translateY(15px);
            }

            /* smaller overshoot */
            55% {
                transform: translateY(-8px);
            }

            /* rebound */
            75% {
                transform: translateY(4px);
            }

            /* smaller bounce */
            90% {
                transform: translateY(-2px);
            }

            /* tiny correction */
            100% {
                transform: translateY(0);
            }

            /* settle */
        }

        @media (min-width: 991px) {

            .section:hover .section-inner,
            .section:hover .view-more {
                animation: elasticY 0.8s ease-out;
            }
        }
    </style>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.13.0/gsap.min.js"
    integrity="sha512-NcZdtrT77bJr4STcmsGAESr06BYGE8woZdSdEgqnpyqac7sugNO+Tr4bGwGF3MsnEkGKhU2KL2xh6Ec+BqsaHA=="
    crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.13.0/dist/CustomEase.min.js"></script>
<script>
    gsap.registerPlugin(CustomEase);
    const sectiona = document.querySelectorAll('.section');

    let isAnimating = false;
    let isexpanded = false
    sectiona.forEach((section, index) => {
        section.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
            if (isAnimating) return;
            isAnimating = true;

            const textContent = section.querySelector('.section .section-inner');
            const testFlavour = section.querySelector('.section .flavour');
            const viewMoreBtn = section.querySelector('.view-more');
            // Instantly move elements up by 30px
            //  gsap.killTweensOf([textContent, viewMoreBtn, testFlavour]);

            // gsap.set([textContent, viewMoreBtn], {
            //     y: -100,
            // });
            // gsap.to([textContent, viewMoreBtn], {
            //     y: 0,
            //     duration: .5,
            //      ease: "elastic.out(1, 0.3)" 
            // });

        });

        section.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
            const textContent = section.querySelector('.section .section-inner');
            const viewMoreBtn = section.querySelector('.view-more');
            const testFlavour = section.querySelector('.section .flavour');
            // Reset position when mouse leaves
            if (isexpanded) return;
            // gsap.killTweensOf([textContent, viewMoreBtn, testFlavour]);
            //    gsap.to([textContent, viewMoreBtn], {color:'white', duration:.2})
            //    gsap.to(viewMoreBtn, { borderColor: 'white', duration:.2 });
            //    gsap.to(testFlavour, { color: 'white', duration:.2 });

            // gsap.to([textContent, viewMoreBtn], {
            //     y: 0,
            //     duration: 0.1,

            // });
        });
    })
    // GSAP Animation equivalent to your CSS hover effects

    let mmh = gsap.matchMedia();

    // add a media query. When it matches, the associated function will run
    mmh.add("(min-width: 991px)", () => {
        // Define hover colors for each section
        const hoverColors = {
            1: '#27A75D',
            2: '#7116B7',
            3: '#E2335D',
            4: '#FE8840'
        };

        // Get all sections

        sectiona.forEach((section, index) => {
            const sectionNumber = index + 1;
            const h1 = section.querySelector('h1');
            const primaryImg = section.querySelector('.primary-img');

            // if (!isAnimating) {
            // Mouse enter animation
            section.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
                if (isexpanded) return;
                gsap.set(section, { backgroundColor: 'white' })
                // Create timeline for synchronized animations
                const tl = gsap.timeline();

                // Background color change
                tl.to(section, {
                    backgroundColor: hoverColors[sectionNumber],
                    duration: 0.15,
                    ease: "cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1.04)"
                });

                // H1 fade out
                tl.to(h1, {
                    autoAlpha: 0,
                    duration: 0.05,
                    ease: "cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1.04)"
                }, 0); // Start at the same time as background (0 offset)

                // Primary image height animation
                tl.to(primaryImg, {
                    height: '20rem',
                    duration: 0.15,
                    ease: "cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1.04)"
                }, 0); // Start at the same time as other animations
            });
            // }
            // Mouse leave animation (reverse)

            // if (!isAnimating) {
            section.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
                if (isexpanded) return;
                const tl = gsap.timeline();

                // Reverse all animations
                tl.to(section, {
                    backgroundColor: 'white', // or original color
                    duration: 0.15,
                    ease: "cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1.04)"
                });

                tl.to(h1, {
                    autoAlpha: 1,
                    duration: 0.05,
                    ease: "cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1.04)"
                }, 0);

                tl.to(primaryImg, {
                    height: 0,
                    duration: 0.15,
                    ease: "cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1.04)"
                }, 0);
            });
            // }

        });

    })


</script>
<script>
    let mm = gsap.matchMedia();

    // add a media query. When it matches, the associated function will run
    mm.add("(min-width: 991px)", () => {


        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section');
            const siblings = document.querySelectorAll('.sibling');
            const sectionMap = new Map();
            let currentExpandedIndex = -1;
            let isAnimating = false; // Prevent rapid clicking

            siblings.forEach((sibling, i) => {
                const sectionWidth = siblings[0].offsetWidth;
                let multiplier;

                switch (i) {
                    case 0:
                        multiplier = 0; // half width left
                        break;
                    case 1:
                        multiplier = -.75;   // full width left
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        multiplier = .1;   // full width left
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        multiplier = -0.2; // half width left
                        break;
                }

                const heading = sibling.querySelector('h1');
                gsap.set(heading, { x: sectionWidth * multiplier, autoAlpha: 0 });
            });

            sections.forEach((sec, i) => {
                const sib = document.querySelector(`[data-sibling="${i}"]`);
                sectionMap.set(sec, sib);
            });




            function resetToInitialState() {
                return new Promise((resolve) => {

                    const timeline = gsap.timeline({
                        onComplete: () => {
                            currentExpandedIndex = -1;
                            resolve();
                        }
                    });

                    // Define timing map: [duration, delay] for each section when collapsed
                    const timingMaps = {
                        0: [ // collapsing from section 0 expanded
                            [1.5, 0],   // sec 0
                            [1.5, 0],   // sec 1
                            [1.0, 0.5], // sec 2
                            [0.5, 1.0]  // sec 3
                        ],
                        1: [ // collapsing from section 1 expanded
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.0, .5]
                        ],
                        2: [ // collapsing from section 2 expanded
                            [1.0, .5],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0]
                        ],
                        3: [ // collapsing from section 3 expanded
                            [0.5, 1.0],
                            [1.0, 0.5],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0]
                        ]
                    };

                    const timings = timingMaps[currentExpandedIndex] || [
                        [1.5, 0], [1.5, 0], [1.5, 0], [1.5, 0]
                    ];

                    sections.forEach((section, index) => {
                        const [duration, delay] = timings[index];

                        // Reset section position
                        timeline.to(section, {
                            x: 0,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset sibling
                        timeline.to(siblings[index], {
                            clipPath: "polygon(0 0, 25% 0, 25% 100%, 0 100%)",
                            x: 0,
                            left: `${index * 25}%`,
                            zIndex: 1,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset image position and scale
                        const img = section.querySelector('img');
                        timeline.to(img, {
                            x: 0,
                            scale: 1,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset section header, flavour, and view-more elements
                        const sectionHeader = section.querySelector('.section-header');
                        const sectionFlavour = section.querySelector('.flavour');
                        const sectionViewmore = section.querySelector('.view-more');

                        if (sectionHeader) {
                            timeline.to(sectionHeader, {
                                opacity: 1,
                                x: 0,
                                duration,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0);
                        }

                        if (sectionFlavour) {
                            timeline.to(sectionFlavour, {
                                opacity: 1,
                                x: 0,
                                duration,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0);
                        }

                        if (sectionViewmore) {
                            timeline.to(sectionViewmore, {
                                opacity: 1,
                                x: 0,
                                duration,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0);
                        }

                        // Reset heading and info/size elements
                        const heading = siblings[index].querySelector('h1');
                        const info = siblings[index].querySelector('.info');
                        const size = siblings[index].querySelector('.size');

                        const originalTransforms = {
                            0: { x: 0 * heading.closest('.sibling')?.offsetWidth },
                            1: { x: -.75 * heading.closest('.sibling')?.offsetWidth },
                            2: { x: 0.1 * heading.closest('.sibling')?.offsetWidth },
                            3: { x: -0.2 * heading.closest('.sibling')?.offsetWidth }
                        };

                        timeline.to(heading, {
                            ...originalTransforms[index],
                            autoAlpha: 0,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset info and size opacity
                        if (info) {
                            timeline.to(info, {
                                opacity: 0,
                                duration: .3,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0);
                        }

                        if (size) {
                            timeline.to(size, {
                                opacity: 0,
                                duration,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0);
                        }
                    });

                    // Final cleanup after animation completes
                    timeline.call(() => {
                        isexpanded = false;
                        gsap.set(sections, { backgroundColor: 'white' });
                        sections.forEach(section => {
                            gsap.set(section.querySelector('img'), { height: 0 });
                            gsap.set(section.querySelector('h1'), { autoAlpha: 1 });

                            // Check if mouse is still hovering over this section
                            if (section.matches(':hover')) {
                                const hoverColors = {
                                    1: '#94A845',
                                    2: '#C060A6',
                                    3: '#D7607D',
                                    4: '#E3C079'
                                };
                                // Apply hover styles if mouse is still on the section
                                const sectionIndex = Array.from(sections).indexOf(section) + 1;
                                gsap.set(section, { backgroundColor: hoverColors[sectionIndex] });
                                gsap.set(section.querySelector('img'), { height: '20rem' });
                                gsap.set(section.querySelector('h1'), { autoAlpha: 0 });
                            }
                        });
                    });
                });
            }




            function expandSection(index) {
                return new Promise((resolve) => {
                    isexpanded = true;

                    const section = sections[index];
                    const timeline = gsap.timeline({
                        ease: CustomEase.create("custom", "M0,0 C0.583,0.638 0.607,0.167 1,1 "),
                        // ease:'power2.out',
                        onComplete: resolve
                    });

                    // Reset all siblings clip-path using GSAP
                    gsap.set(siblings, {
                        clipPath: "polygon(0 0, 25% 0, 25% 100%, 0 100%)",
                        zIndex: 1
                    });

                    const multipliers = [1.5, .5, -0.5, -1.5];
                    const multiplier = multipliers[index];
                    const sectionWidth = section.offsetWidth * multiplier;
                    const headingWidth = siblings[0].offsetWidth * .5;
                    const headingAnimations = {
                        0: { x: headingWidth },
                        1: { x: 0 },
                        2: { x: 0 },
                        3: { x: 0 }
                    };

                    const img = section.querySelector('img');
                    const sectionHeader = section.querySelector('.section-header');
                    const sectionFlavour = section.querySelector('.flavour');
                    const sectionViewmore = section.querySelector('.view-more');
                    const heading = siblings[index].querySelector('h1');
                    const info = siblings[index].querySelector('.info');
                    const size = siblings[index].querySelector('.size');
                    timeline.to(sectionHeader, {
                        opacity: 0,
                        duration: 1,
                        x: index < 2 ? 100 : -100,

                    }, 0)
                    timeline.to(sectionViewmore, {
                        opacity: 0,
                        duration: 1,
                        x: index < 2 ? 100 : -100,

                    }, 0)
                    timeline.to(sectionFlavour, {
                        opacity: 0,
                        duration: 1,
                        x: index < 2 ? 100 : -100,

                    }, 0)
                    timeline.to(img, {
                        x: sectionWidth,
                        duration: 1.6,
                        scale: 1.4,
                        // ease: "none"
                    }, 0);

                    timeline.to(heading, {
                        ...headingAnimations[index],
                        duration: 1.5,
                        autoAlpha: 1,
                        // ease: "none"
                    }, 0)

                        .to(info, {
                            opacity: 1,
                            duration: 1.5
                        }, '-=1')
                        .to(size, {
                            opacity: 1,
                            duration: .5
                        }, '-=.4')


                    const notClicked = [...sections].filter(sec => sec !== section);
                    const clickedIndex = parseInt(section.dataset.index);

                    // Animate non-clicked sections
                    notClicked.forEach((sec, i) => {
                        const secSibling = sectionMap.get(sec);
                        const secIndex = parseInt(sec.dataset.index);

                        let translateValue;
                        let duration;

                        if (secIndex < clickedIndex) {
                            const positionsFromLeft = secIndex + 1;
                            translateValue = -positionsFromLeft * 100;
                            const leftPriority = clickedIndex - secIndex;
                            if (leftPriority === 1) {
                                duration = 1.5;
                            } else if (leftPriority === 2) {
                                duration = 1.0;
                            } else {
                                duration = 0.5;
                            }
                        } else {
                            const positionsFromRight = (3 - secIndex) + 1;
                            translateValue = positionsFromRight * 100;
                            const rightOrder = secIndex - clickedIndex;
                            if (rightOrder === 1) {
                                duration = 1.5;
                            } else if (rightOrder === 2) {
                                duration = 1.0;
                            } else {
                                duration = 0.5;
                            }
                        }

                        timeline.to(sec, {
                            x: `${translateValue}%`,
                            duration: duration,
                            // ease: "sine.in",
                        }, 0);

                        timeline.to(secSibling, {
                            x: `${translateValue / 4}%`,
                            duration: duration,
                            // ease: "sine.in",
                        }, 0);
                    });

                    // Expand corresponding sibling
                    const correspondingSibling = document.querySelector(`[data-sibling="${index}"]`);
                    timeline.to(correspondingSibling, {
                        clipPath: "polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%)",
                        left: 0,
                        zIndex: 5,
                        duration: 1.5,


                    }, 0);
                });
            }

            const container = document.querySelector('.container');
            container.addEventListener('click', async function (event) {
                // Prevent rapid clicking
                if (isAnimating) return;

                // Check if click is on a section
                const clickedSection = event.target.closest('.section');
                gsap.set(clickedSection, { backgroundColor: 'transparent' })
                if (clickedSection) {
                    // Handle section click
                    isAnimating = true;
                    const index = parseInt(clickedSection.dataset.index);

                    try {
                        // If clicking on the currently expanded section, reset to initial state
                        if (currentExpandedIndex === index) {
                            await resetToInitialState();
                            currentExpandedIndex = -1;
                        } else {
                            // If another section is expanded, reset first
                            if (currentExpandedIndex !== -1) {
                                await resetToInitialState();
                            }

                            // Then expand the new section
                            currentExpandedIndex = index;
                            await expandSection(index);
                        }
                    } finally {
                        isAnimating = false;
                    }
                } else {
                    // Click is outside sections - collapse if any section is expanded
                    if (currentExpandedIndex !== -1) {
                        isAnimating = true;
                        try {
                            await resetToInitialState();
                            currentExpandedIndex = -1;
                        } finally {
                            isAnimating = false;
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
        });

    });




    // Mobile version - Vertical expansion animation
    let mmMobile = gsap.matchMedia();

    mmMobile.add("(max-width: 991px)", () => {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section');
            const siblings = document.querySelectorAll('.sibling');
            const sectionMap = new Map();
            let currentExpandedIndex = -1;
            let isAnimating = false;

            // Initialize mobile siblings positioning
            siblings.forEach((sibling, i) => {
                const sectionHeight = siblings[0].offsetHeight;
                let multiplier;

                switch (i) {
                    case 0:
                        multiplier = -.5;
                        break;
                    case 1:
                        multiplier = -0.75;
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        multiplier = 0.1;
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        multiplier = -0.2;
                        break;
                }

                const heading = sibling.querySelector('h1');
                gsap.set(heading, { y: sectionHeight * multiplier, autoAlpha: 0 });
            });

            // Map sections to siblings
            sections.forEach((sec, i) => {
                const sib = document.querySelector(`[data-sibling="${i}"]`);
                sectionMap.set(sec, sib);
            });

            function resetToInitialStateMobile() {
                return new Promise((resolve) => {
                    const timeline = gsap.timeline({
                        onComplete: () => {
                            currentExpandedIndex = -1;
                            resolve();
                        }
                    });

                    // Mobile timing maps for vertical collapse
                    const timingMaps = {
                        0: [
                            [1.5, 0],   // sec 0
                            [1.5, 0],   // sec 1
                            [1.0, 0.5], // sec 2
                            [0.5, 1.0]  // sec 3
                        ],
                        1: [
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.0, .5]
                        ],
                        2: [
                            [1.0, .5],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0]
                        ],
                        3: [
                            [0.5, 1.0],
                            [1.0, 0.5],
                            [1.5, 0],
                            [1.5, 0]
                        ]
                    };

                    const timings = timingMaps[currentExpandedIndex] || [
                        [1.5, 0], [1.5, 0], [1.5, 0], [1.5, 0]
                    ];

                    sections.forEach((section, index) => {
                        const [duration, delay] = timings[index];

                        // Reset section position (vertical)
                        timeline.to(section, {
                            y: 0,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset sibling (vertical clip-path)
                        timeline.to(siblings[index], {
                            clipPath: "polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 25%, 0 25%)",
                            y: 0,
                            top: `${index * 25}%`,
                            zIndex: 1,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset image position and scale
                        const img = section.querySelector('img');
                        timeline.to(img, {
                            y: 0,
                            x: 0, // Reset horizontal position
                            scale: 1,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);

                        // Reset section header and flavour
                        const sectionHeader = section.querySelector('.section-header');
                        const sectionFlavour = section.querySelector('.flavour');

                        if (sectionHeader) {
                            timeline.to(sectionHeader, {
                                opacity: 1,
                                y: 0,
                                duration,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0)
                                .to(sectionHeader, { color: 'black', duration: .3 })
                        }


                        if (sectionFlavour) {
                            timeline.to(sectionFlavour, {
                                opacity: 1,
                                y: 0,
                                duration,
                                delay,
                                ease: "none"
                            }, 0);
                        }

                        // Reset heading
                        const heading = siblings[index].querySelector('h1');

                        const originalTransforms = {
                            0: { y: -.5 * heading.parentElement.offsetHeight },
                            1: { y: -.75 * heading.parentElement.offsetHeight },
                            2: { y: 0.1 * heading.parentElement.offsetHeight },
                            3: { y: -0.2 * heading.parentElement.offsetHeight }
                        };

                        timeline.to(heading, {
                            ...originalTransforms[index],
                            autoAlpha: 0,
                            duration,
                            delay,
                            ease: "none"
                        }, 0);
                    });

                    // Final cleanup
                    timeline.call(() => {
                        isexpanded = false;
                        gsap.set(sections, { backgroundColor: 'white' });
                    });
                });
            }

            function expandSectionMobile(index) {
                return new Promise((resolve) => {
                    isexpanded = true;

                    const section = sections[index];
                    const timeline = gsap.timeline({
                        ease: CustomEase.create("custom", "M0,0 C0.583,0.638 0.607,0.167 1,1 "),
                        onComplete: resolve
                    });

                    // Reset all siblings clip-path for mobile
                    gsap.set(siblings, {
                        clipPath: "polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 25%, 0 25%)",
                        zIndex: 1
                    });

                    const multipliers = [1.5, .5, -0.5, -1.5];
                    const multiplier = multipliers[index];
                    const sectionHeight = section.offsetHeight * multiplier;
                    const headingHeight = siblings[0].offsetHeight * .5;

                    const headingAnimations = {
                        0: { y: 0 },
                        1: { y: 0 },
                        2: { y: 0 },
                        3: { y: 0 }
                    };

                    const img = section.querySelector('img');
                    const sectionHeader = section.querySelector('.section-header');
                    const sectionFlavour = section.querySelector('.flavour');
                    const heading = siblings[index].querySelector('h1');

                    // Animate section content out
                    timeline.to(sectionHeader, {
                        opacity: 0,
                        duration: 1,
                        y: index < 2 ? 100 : -100,
                    }, 0);

                    timeline.to(sectionFlavour, {
                        opacity: 0,
                        duration: 1,
                        y: index < 2 ? 100 : -100,
                    }, 0);

                    // Animate image (vertical movement)
                    timeline.to(img, {
                        y: sectionHeight,
                        duration: 1.6,
                        x: '-25vw',
                        scale: 2.2,
                    }, 0);

                    // Animate heading
                    timeline.to(heading, {
                        ...headingAnimations[index],
                        duration: 1.5,
                        autoAlpha: 1,
                    }, 0);

                    // Animate non-clicked sections vertically
                    const notClicked = [...sections].filter(sec => sec !== section);
                    const clickedIndex = parseInt(section.dataset.index);

                    notClicked.forEach((sec, i) => {
                        const secSibling = sectionMap.get(sec);
                        const secIndex = parseInt(sec.dataset.index);

                        let translateValue;
                        let duration;

                        if (secIndex < clickedIndex) {
                            const positionsFromTop = secIndex + 1;
                            translateValue = -positionsFromTop * 100;
                            const topPriority = clickedIndex - secIndex;
                            if (topPriority === 1) {
                                duration = 1.5;
                            } else if (topPriority === 2) {
                                duration = 1.0;
                            } else {
                                duration = 0.5;
                            }
                        } else {
                            const positionsFromBottom = (3 - secIndex) + 1;
                            translateValue = positionsFromBottom * 100;
                            const bottomOrder = secIndex - clickedIndex;
                            if (bottomOrder === 1) {
                                duration = 1.5;
                            } else if (bottomOrder === 2) {
                                duration = 1.0;
                            } else {
                                duration = 0.5;
                            }
                        }

                        timeline.to(sec, {
                            y: `${translateValue}%`,
                            duration: duration,
                        }, 0);

                        timeline.to(secSibling, {
                            y: `${translateValue / 4}%`,
                            duration: duration,
                        }, 0);
                    });

                    // Expand corresponding sibling vertically
                    const correspondingSibling = document.querySelector(`[data-sibling="${index}"]`);
                    timeline.to(correspondingSibling, {
                        clipPath: "polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%)",
                        top: 0,
                        zIndex: 5,
                        duration: 1.5,
                    }, 0);
                });
            }

            // Mobile click handler
            const container = document.querySelector('.container');
            container.addEventListener('click', async function (event) {
                if (isAnimating) return;

                const clickedSection = event.target.closest('.section');

                if (clickedSection) {
                    isAnimating = true;
                    gsap.set(clickedSection, { backgroundColor: 'transparent' });
                    const index = parseInt(clickedSection.dataset.index);

                    try {
                        if (currentExpandedIndex === index) {
                            await resetToInitialStateMobile();
                            currentExpandedIndex = -1;
                        } else {
                            if (currentExpandedIndex !== -1) {
                                await resetToInitialStateMobile();
                            }
                            currentExpandedIndex = index;
                            await expandSectionMobile(index);
                        }
                    } finally {
                        isAnimating = false;
                    }
                } else {
                    if (currentExpandedIndex !== -1) {
                        isAnimating = true;
                        try {
                            await resetToInitialStateMobile();
                            currentExpandedIndex = -1;
                        } finally {
                            isAnimating = false;
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
        });
    });



</script>
